drupalNodeEvent.title: Sunflowers and Umbrellas: Social Movements, Expressive Prctices, and Political Culture in Taiwan and Hong Kong

field_speakers.processed:
"Thomas Gold", "Edmund Cheng", "Ming-sho Ho", "Wai-man Lam", "Ian Rowen",
"Brian Hioe", "Lev Nachman", "Ngok Ma"

field_organizers.processed: Center for Chinese Studies University of California, Berkeley

field_description.processed: Contributors to an edited volume released November 2020 discuss their chapters as well as aftermath of social movements in 2014 for current events in Taiwan and Hong Kong.
